description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HelpieWP Accordion & FAQ – Helpie WordPress Accordion FAQ Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Accordion & FAQ – Helpie WordPress Accordion FAQ Plugin: from n/a through 1.27.

product.name: Accordion & FAQ – Helpie WordPress Accordion FAQ Plugin
